newsitem.title: USA: Truevision Inc sees Q1 1997 loss.
newsitem.headline: Truevision Inc sees Q1 1997 loss.

text.p: Truevision Inc said it expects to record a "significant" operating and net loss for the first quarter of fiscal 1997, which ended September 28, due to accounting changes.
The company said it will change its accounting practices regarding the recognition of revenues related to sales through its domestic retail and international distribution channels.
As a result, Truevision said it will record a special charge in the first quarter of fiscal 1997.
Also, first quarter revenues will be "substantially" below those reported in the previous quarter and the first quarter last year, Truevision said.
The company was not immediately available to provide comparison revenue figures.
